member.name: T:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: 지역화된 문자열 등을 찾기 위한 강력한 형식의 리소스 클래스입니다.

member.name: P:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: 이 클래스에서 사용하는 캐시된 ResourceManager 인스턴스를 반환합니다.

member.name: P:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: 이 강력한 형식의 리소스 클래스를 사용하여 모든 리소스 조회에 대해 현재 스레드의 CurrentUICulture 속성을 재정의합니다.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.AddSound(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds and opens a (.wav) or (.mp3) sound file to the sound collection.
member.param: A name to refer to the sound being added.
The full path and name to the sound file.
member.returns: True if the sound is successfully added.
member.remarks: Name can only be used once. If another sound has the same name the file will not be added and the function returns False.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.RemoveSound(System.String)
member.summary: Closes the sound file and removes it from the sound collection.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.ClearSounds
member.summary: Closes all sound files and removes them from the sound collection.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.Play(System.String)
member.param: The Name of the sound to play.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.Stop(System.String)
member.param: The Name of the sound to stop.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.Pause(System.String)
member.param: The Name of the sound to pause.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.Resume(System.String)
member.param: The Name of the sound to resume.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.IsPlaying(System.String)
member.param: The Name used to add and refer to the sound.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.IsStopped(System.String)
member.param: The Name used to add and refer to the sound.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.IsPaused(System.String)
member.param: The Name used to add and refer to the sound.

member.name: M:Visual_Basic_Shooting_Game.GameSounds.SetVolume(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the Volume. Does not seem to work for (.wav) files. Works on mp3 though.
member.param: An integer value from 0 to 1000 to set the volume to.
